Articles.Content:
Challenge: Build a rocket that can get at least 1 kerbal into orbit by using ONLY DECOUPLERS. The only non-decoupler parts that can be added are command pods, passenger modules and parachutes. If you do not use parachutes to land, you will have a bonus if you do it successfully. You must use stock parts for the launch, with TweakScale. Highest score wins.

 

Scoring:

  • 100 points for getting into low Kerbin orbit successfully
  • 250 points for getting into orbit successfully and deorbiting, and landing.
  • 100 points for each kerbal on the launch
  • -200 points for each kerbal killed or left behind in the mission
  • Scoring:
  • Bonus of 4000 points for landing Val on Vall.
  • Bonus of 10000 points for visiting every body listed above.
  • Bonus of 5000 points for successfully landing without parachutes
  • Bonus of 10000 points for not using TweakScale.

Badges

To be added
